News

On 7 February, the pencils will be able to rest from the snow

On Wednesday, 7 February, the Penzen region is expected to have clouds with no significant rainfall. The regional hydrometeo centre gave this forecast.

Penzen " Diesel " lost his last chance to go to playoffs.

On Tuesday, 6 February, Penzen ' s " Diesel " suffered a rupture defeat from the Tambas HC on a retreat.
06.02.2024

Drivers of route No. 85 in a hurry blocked the drain. Red


The driving manoeuvres of some routers in Penza often unpleasantly surprises other road users. Another violation of the CPD that hit the cell appeared on Tuesday, 6 February.
06.02.2024

The police apprehended an attempt to kidnap a pupil of Russian in the Balaclav.


In Bashkiria, an 18-year-old Russian was detained trying to kidnap a high school. On Tuesday, 6 February, Telegram-canal 112 reports.
06.02.2024

The Sputnik road on Pova Street has become dangerous for children


On the rooftops of the houses and balconys on the Popova street in Penza, the safety of children attending garden No. 109 (File No. 1) and the Sputnik DJS is threatened.
06.02.2024

New ways of combating poems are being introduced in the Penzen region


This winter in the Penza region is characterized by very difficult weather conditions. That's what Governor Oleg Melnichenko thinks. Methods for addressing the effects of snowfalls were discussed in the regional government on Tuesday, 6 February.
06.02.2024

Can I get an old number for a new car?


I'm buying a new car, I'm selling an old car. Can I use the old numbers? They're just very expensive.
06.02.2024

The pensioner was unable to reduce the amount of maintenance


The prison was unable to change the order of maintenance for two of his minor children.
06.02.2024

The Ministry of Health allowed the sale of contraceptives without prescription.


Popular emergency contraception can be purchased in pharmacy without recipe or even ordered online. The Ministry of Health of Russia approved free sales.
06.02.2024

In Penza, they'll deal with dog attacks on schoolgirls.


It happened on the afternoon of 28 December at school No. 20 on the Pilot Street in Gidrostro. The stai turned on a girl, and she couldn't get out, she threw her bag in their direction and ran to school.
06.02.2024

Demand for smart house products has increased in the Pennsentiary Region


The experts observed that in 2023 Rossyanas were more likely to purchase goods for a smart house in the Megafona and Yota joint retail network. The demand grew by 90%.
06.02.2024

In the week, 910 residents of the Penza region identified influenza


In the Penza region, the last week, from 29 January to 4 February, there was a slight decline in RWI and influenza morbidity. During this period, 4,167 cases were recorded, 11.2 per cent less than in the previous seven days.
06.02.2024

In Penza, the ambulance didn't reach the baby in 1.5 hours.


Penza's resident is dismayed that in an hour no ambulance was waiting for a child suspected of acute appendicitis. In the end, the hospital had to reach its own strength.
06.02.2024

7 February - winter sports day in Russia


There's a good reason to ski, horses, go out in the fresh air or even clean the snow, because it's also physical exercise.
06.02.2024

The cars were advised that the shells should be spared.


To protect the car from the precipitation of the carpet, you need to lay a sink bar. Experts from the Network of Belnovosti were advised by motorists.
06.02.2024

In Russia, they offered to exchange oil for flowers


The Ghosmouth deputate from the faction of CRCF Sergei Gavrilov proposed to exchange Russian oil for tulips and other flowers from Kenya, Ecuador and Colombia. His words are RIA News.
06.02.2024

A Russian arriving in the United States without a passport and tickets announced the verdict. What's waiting for him?


Russiaan Sergei Ochigave, who travelled to the United States without a passport, tickets and visas, declared a verdict. Previously, the jury found him guilty of an uncompleted journey, and now he is awaiting a fine and deportation from the country.
06.02.2024

In Mazda CX-5, a woman killed a young man in the transition area


On Monday, 5 February, a road traffic accident hit the young pedestrian in Zahren.
06.02.2024

X-ray: In the Secure Paper Print, savings were explained


X-rays shall be printed on the sheets of the ordinary paper format A4. However, the quality of professional work was not affected, and was assured by the administration of the closed city.
06.02.2024

In the Penza region, the linings seized 5 kg of mephedron and 7 kg of hashisha


In the Penza, the Rhosgardi Regional Office and the police stopped a Mitsubishi Lancer vehicle in which two men were male, a 32-year-old resident of Moscow province and a 24-year-old foreign national.
06.02.2024

What's the number plate color on the car?


There's a lot of colorful car numbers on the streets. It's clear they don't belong to normal transport, but what do they mean?
06.02.2024

The Moscow Court complained about the verdict of Ivan Belosersev


On Tuesday, 6 February, an appeal was filed against the verdict of Izmaylovsk District Court of Moscow, former Governor of Penza province, Ivan Belosersev. The relevant information was available on the institution ' s website.
06.02.2024

In Gosdum, there were plans to return all convicted Russians to the United States.


Moscow will find it difficult to return all convicted Russians to the home of the United States and considers member of the Committee of the State Committee on International Affairs, Maria Butin. In her conversation with Lenta.ru, she expressed the plans of Russian diplomats to ensure the return of all compatriots in American prisons.
06.02.2024

In the Penza region, 5 drivers have accumulated fines of 3 million


In the Penza region, the staff of the State Inspectorate and the judiciary united in the fight against the debts of the inhabitants of the region. They're on their way to detain drivers who don't pay fines.
06.02.2024

On Karl Marx's street, the pencils could fall snow on their head.


Large snow plasters are hanging from the roof of Penzen's gymnastics No. 4 "Stupeni" on the street of Carl Marx. The photo sent a reader to the PenzaInform Network. The picture shows that the snow is about to go lavin.
06.02.2024

The Zhemetchin helicopter survey site was built without authorization


Supervisory officials found that the local government had not issued permits for the construction and commissioning of the site.
06.02.2024

In several departments of Penzen Hospital No. 6, repairs are under way


Ongoing repairs include grounding, hating and painting of walls. The builders will replace ceiling coatings and reset the floors. In addition, lighting devices, switches and pinks will be replaced.
06.02.2024

In the Upgrade Family area, new apartments were sold.


The Risen Building Group has marketed the second construction of the Upgrade Family Complex in the 9th Arbekovo microreion in Penza.
06.02.2024

The number of coronavirus victims is increasing in the Penn region


In the Penza region, from 29 January to 4 February, 246 cases of coronavirus infection were detected, 13 fewer than a week earlier.
06.02.2024

The TNA Energy Penza business clients refuse paper documents


The Energy Penza TNA invites business clients to connect electronic document processing (EDI) and to share data with the remote company.
06.02.2024

In the Russian region, a huge dump of chicken eggs was found


A huge dump of chicken eggs was found in Oma province. Regional Rosselhosssor has already begun to figure out where it came from. This has been reported to the press service of the Russian Department, and is being transmitted to the RIA News.
06.02.2024

Explained the riddle of moths flying


The scientists of the London Imperial College and the International University of Florida explained the mysterious behaviour of moths flying to artificial light sources, such as light bulbs, and circling around them. The results of the study are published in Nature Communications.
06.02.2024

In Ryazan oblast, Penzen Kamaz entered a car


On Monday, 5 February, in the Rybnov district of Ryazan province, an accident involving a foam was carried out.
06.02.2024

The pencil left the keys in an unlocked car and lost it.


In Penza, someone else's unlocked WAZ 2115 became light mining for a 35-year-old cousin. He went into it and left, but he couldn't get away with it.
06.02.2024

In Penza, the resource people who didn't rebuild the road after excavation were fined.


In Penza, a resource-equipping organization was fined, which did not clean up the section of the internal quartet on the street of Crimea after the groundwork.
